verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
You gave me shelter when I have no other
You made a way where there's no way
You turned my darkness into light
Awadupe Baba
You put food on my table daddy
You comfort me when I was down
Who can be compared unto you
Awadupe Baba
Chorus....
Ese Oluwa
Ese Baba o
Ese Oluwa
Awadupe Baba
